    • Constructor Detail

      • PTA

        public PTA(java.util.List<java.lang.String> alphabet)
        Constructor: build an empty PTA.
        Parameters:
        alphabet - The set of (non-tau) actions that can label transitions. This is *syntactically* defined, e.g., in PRISM it's the list of all actions appearing in commands, but may be a strict superset of the actions that actually label transitions.
